summary: Offers a collection of unit tests that verify the correctness of fundamental audio utility operations, including signal‑to‑distortion ratio calculations, scale‑invariant SDR, convolution matrix generation, decibel conversions, segment start indexing, RMS measurement, and Toeplitz matrix construction.
business_intent: Ensure the reliability and accuracy of audio processing functions so that downstream signal‑analysis and audio‑engineering applications can be built with confidence in the underlying mathematical utilities.
